LanguageData.Gas_OPToxin.label: Toxin Gas
LanguageData.Mote_Firetrail.label: Mote
LanguageData.Mote_Smoketrail.label: Mote
LanguageData.Mote_FTSmoketrail.label: Mote
LanguageData.Mote_GreenSmoketrail.label: Mote
LanguageData.VWE_ToxicGasCloud.label: toxic gas
LanguageData.VWE_SmokeCloud.label: smoke cloud
LanguageData.VWE_SmokeGrenade.label: smoke grenades
LanguageData.VWE_SmokeGrenade.description: Old school condensed smoke canister that explodes into a smoke wall on impact.
LanguageData.VWE_SmokeGrenade.verbs.0.label: throw smoke grenade
LanguageData.VWE_Projectile_SmokeGrenade.label: smoke grenade
LanguageData.VWE_ToxicGrenade.label: toxic grenades
LanguageData.VWE_ToxicGrenade.description: Charge powered lethal gas canister causing severe toxic buildup over a very short period of time.
LanguageData.VWE_ToxicGrenade.verbs.0.label: throw toxic grenade
LanguageData.VWE_Projectile_ToxicGrenade.label: toxic grenade
LanguageData.VWE_FlashGrenade.label: flash grenades
LanguageData.VWE_FlashGrenade.description: A flash grenade. Temporarily stuns organic enemies allowing users to close the distance.
LanguageData.VWE_FlashGrenade.verbs.0.label: throw flash grenade
LanguageData.VWE_Projectile_FlashGrenade.label: flash grenade
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Shovel.label: shovel
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Shovel.description: Commonly used across the battlefield to dig trenches, this small portable shovel is an excellent close range weapon.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Shovel.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Shovel.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Baton.label: baton
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Baton.description: A short peacekeeping baton commonly used by prison guards and urbworld militia.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Baton.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Baton.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_CombatKnife.label: combat knife
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_CombatKnife.description: One of mankind's oldest manufactured objects. The knife has taken many forms, but the concept has always remained the same: A handle for holding and a sharp edge for cutting.\n\nCombat knife is a standard issue melee weapon for most of the military forces.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Wrench.label: wrench
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Wrench.description: A universal instrument to make even the sturdiest things work.\n\nAids with construction and breaking down Mechanoid constructs.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Wrench.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Wrench.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Cleaver.label: cleaver
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Cleaver.description: One of mankind's oldest manufactured objects. The knife has taken many forms, but the concept has always remained the same: A handle for holding and a sharp edge for cutting.\n\nThis type of knife is commonly used by chefs to cut meat and bones alike.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Cleaver.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Cleaver.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Scalpel.label: scalpel
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Scalpel.description: One of mankind's oldest manufactured objects. The knife has taken many forms, but the concept has always remained the same: A handle for holding and a sharp edge for cutting.\n\nThis blade is commonly used by surgeons due to it's extreme sharpness.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Scalpel.tools.0.label: blade
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Scalpel.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.label: pickaxe
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.description: This basic invention is effective as a weapon, while being a tool at the same time. Needs some muscles to work with, but makes digging through mountains overall more comfortable.\n\nThe shape of the head allows to pierce thicker armor.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.label: hammer
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.description: A hammer is a tool that consists of a heavy piece of metal or stone at the end of a handle. It is used, for example, to hit nails into a piece of wood or a wall.\n\nThis basic invention is effective as a weapon, while being a tool at the same time. Needs some muscles to work with, but lets you construct with more ease.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.label: battle axe
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.description: A mighty weapon on the battlefield in the right kind of hands. Made to cut through flesh and bones alike.\n\nFavored by the Berserker clans, the battle axe is a weapon usually used by medieval knights. With a powerful swing it is capable of eliminating most enemies in close quarters.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.label: halberd
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.description: Halberd is a pike fitted with a light axe head. Due to the spear-like sharp tip, it's a great tool against armored enemies.\n\nUsed to fight down horse-mounted warriors in medieval times thanks to its its extraordinary length.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Axe.label: hatchet
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Axe.description: An axe head fastened to a handle. Suitable for one hand, due to the shape of a wedge it doesn't require significant force to cut armor and flesh.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Axe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Axe.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.label: triple rocket launcher
LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.description: A single-use rocket launcher that fires a cluster of three large-bore explosive rockets. Good against smalll groups of tough targets.\n\nBecause of its unwieldiness, single-use limitation, and the massive destruction it causes, it's said that one must be slightly crazy to use this weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.label: doomsday rocket launcher
LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.description: A single-use rocket launcher that fires a massive explosive projectile. Good against large groups of soft targets. Starts fires.\n\nBecause of its unwieldiness, single-use limitation, and the massive destruction it causes, it's said that one must be slightly crazy to use this weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_RocketLauncher.label: rocket launcher
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_RocketLauncher.description: Fires a single mortar shell at high accuracy.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_RocketLauncher.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bow_Compound.label: compound bow
LanguageData.VWE_Bow_Compound.description: A modern day bow using levers system to fire an arrow over long distances.\n\nDue to the silencing mechanism, this bow doesn't emit any considerable sound upon firing, which makes it useful in hunting.
LanguageData.VWE_Bow_Compound.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.VWE_Arrow_Compound.label: compound bow arrow
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_HandCannon.label: hand cannon bullet
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HandCannon.label: Hand Cannon
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HandCannon.description: Slow firing revolver firing large caliber projectiles over long distances.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HandCannon.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HandCannon.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_CombatHandgun.label: combat handgun bullet
LanguageData.VWE_CombatHandgun.label: combat handgun
LanguageData.VWE_CombatHandgun.description: Semi-automatic pistol designed for personal defense. The advanced counter-recoil system allows this weapon to be fired significantly faster than a standard autopistol.
LanguageData.VWE_CombatHandgun.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.VWE_CombatHandgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_SawedOffShotgun.label: shotgun blast
LanguageData.VWE_SawedOffShotgun.label: sawed-off Shotgun
LanguageData.VWE_SawedOffShotgun.description: Short double-barreled shotgun. Whilst not having the same range as a standard shotgun, this weapon fires two barrels in quick successions.
LanguageData.VWE_SawedOffShotgun.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.VWE_SawedOffShotgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_GrenadeLauncher.label: frag grenade
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_GrenadeLauncher.label: grenade launcher
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_GrenadeLauncher.description: A military issue grenade launcher intended for anti-infantry use.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_GrenadeLauncher.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_GrenadeLauncher.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Flamethrower.label: flamethrower
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Flamethrower.description: Mechanical incendiary device designed to release a controllable stream of burning chemfuel.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Flamethrower.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Flamethrower.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_Flamethrower.label: flamethrower fuel
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_FireExtinguisher.label: fire extinguisher
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_FireExtinguisher.description: Filled with a multi-purpose flame supressant, this item can be used to extinguish any kind of fire encountered in the field.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_FireExtinguisher.tools.0.label: canister
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_FireExtinguisher.label: flame suppresant
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_SemiAutomaticRifle.label: semi-automatic rifle bullet
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_SemiAutomaticRifle.label: semi-automatic rifle
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_SemiAutomaticRifle.description: Semi-automatic model of a standard bolt action rifle. Whilst not as accurate and powerful as the predecessor, it makes up with fast firing speed.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_SemiAutomaticRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_SemiAutomaticRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_LeverActionRifle.label: lever-action rifle bullet
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_LeverActionRifle.label: lever-action rifle
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_LeverActionRifle.description: A rifle that uses a lever located around the trigger guard area to load fresh cartridges. Whilst not as powerful as other rifles, this gun allows for rapid reload.\n\nUsed widely around the western worlds for the ability to be shot single-handedly on the horseback.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_LeverActionRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_LeverActionRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_LightSMG.label: light SMG pistol bullet
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_LightSMG.label: light SMG
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_LightSMG.description: Open bolt lightweight submachine gun with improved cooling, allowing for longer bursts before weapon needs to be cooled.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_LightSMG.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_LightSMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_SMG.label: smg bullet
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_SMG.label: SMG
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_SMG.description: A compact submachine gun. Whilst it doesn't have long range of fire, it deals significant damage in close range.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_SMG.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_SMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_HMG.label: HMG bullet
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HMG.label: HMG
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HMG.description: A water-cooled type of machine gun. It's heavy and unwieldy, but delivers tremendous amount of damage thanks to armor piercing ammunition. Belt-fed ammunition ensures continuous volley of bullets as long as the person firing them is strong enough to hold the gun.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HMG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_HMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ServiceRifle.label: assault rifle bullet
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ServiceRifle.label: service rifle
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ServiceRifle.description: A versatile and rugged assault rifle widely used around the galaxy by militia forces and mercenaries.\n\nNot as powerful as an assault rifle, but deliver 4 shot bursts.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ServiceRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ServiceRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_BattleRifle.label: assault rifle bullet
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_BattleRifle.label: battle rifle
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_BattleRifle.description: A semi-automatic rifle commonly used by special forces due to it's range and accuracy.\n\nSlightly longer range and higher damage than an Assault Rifle, but only fires two round bursts.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_BattleRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_BattleRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_Carbine.label: carbine bullet
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Carbine.label: carbine
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Carbine.description: Short bullpup carbine, used often in close quarters urban combat.\n\nWhilst it's accurate at close range, due to the short stock it is incapable of firing accurately at rifle range.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Carbine.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Carbine.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_MarksmanRifle.label: marksman rifle bullet
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_MarksmanRifle.label: marksman rifle
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_MarksmanRifle.description: A designated marksman rifle.\n\nWhilst it shares similarities with a standard bolt-action rifle, it trades off it's damage for firing two shots in quick succession.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_MarksmanRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_MarksmanRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_AntiMaterialRifle.label: anti-material impact shell
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_AntiMaterialRifle.label: anti-material rifle
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_AntiMaterialRifle.description: Being a .50 caliber rifle, this weapon was designed to fight enemy armored equipment.\n\nUsed widely around the rim in mechanoid warzones, this weapon is also useful against infantry, allowing for a 1-hit kill.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_AntiMaterialRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_AntiMaterialRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bow_Crossbow.label: crossbow
LanguageData.VWE_Bow_Crossbow.description: A crossbow is a type of ranged weapon in similar principle to a bow, consisting of a bow-like assembly mounted horizontally on a main frame, which is handheld in a similar fashion to the stock of a long gun.\n\nThis weapon attempt of early mankind can send a bolt even through strongest metal.
LanguageData.VWE_Bow_Crossbow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.VWE_Arrow_Bolt.label: crossbow bolt
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Musket.label: musket
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Musket.description: An ancient pattern musket. As one of the first of its kind, it only has short range and low fire rate.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Musket.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Musket.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Leadball.label: lead ball
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Flintlock.label: flintlock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Flintlock.description: This pistol features a smoothbore barrel and a long, wooden grip ending in a knob. As its name implies, the flintlock pistol is operated by a flintlock mechanism.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Flintlock.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_Flintlock.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Throwing_Knives.label: throwing knives
LanguageData.VWE_Throwing_Knives.description: A set of well balanced knives, perfect for throwing.
LanguageData.VWE_Throwing_Knives.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_Throwing_Knives.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.VWE_Throwing_Knives.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.VWE_FlyingBlade.label: small knife
LanguageData.VWE_Tool_Whip.label: Whip
LanguageData.VWE_Tool_Whip.description: A traditional tool used for striking animals to aid guidance and earn obedience.\n\nCan be used on people.
LanguageData.VWE_Tool_Whip.tools.0.label: edge
LanguageData.VWE_WhipSlash.label: whip slash
LanguageData.VWE_Throwing_Rocks.label: throwing rocks
LanguageData.VWE_Throwing_Rocks.description: A handful of rocks. Can inflict minor injuries in close range. Doesn't drop on death. Simple but effective.
LanguageData.VWE_Throwing_Rocks.tools.0.label: edge
LanguageData.VWE_Rock.label: small rock
LanguageData.VWE_Bow_Long.label: long bow
LanguageData.VWE_Bow_Long.description: Longbow is a massive long range neolithic weapon, capable of firing a powerful arrow over extremely long distances.\n\nArrows fired from this bow fly overhead, avoiding getting stopped by obstacles.
LanguageData.VWE_Bow_Long.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.VWE_Arrow_Long.label: longbow arrow
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargePistol.label: charge pistol shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargePistol.label: charge pistol
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargePistol.description: A charged-shot pistol. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nThis three round burst pistol is a very effective sidearm deployed across all regiments of imperial commandos.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargePistol.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeShotgun.label: charge shotgun blast
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeShotgun.label: charge shotgun
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeShotgun.description: A charged-shot slug thrower. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nDeadly in close range, this shotgun has been banned by the imperial military for inflicting unmeasurable pain.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeShotgun.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeSMG.label: rapid charge shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSMG.label: charge SMG
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSMG.description: A charged-shot submachine gun. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nFires rapidly but requires to close the distance between the target.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSMG.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeLMG.label: charge LMG shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeLMG.label: charge LMG
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeLMG.description: A charged-shot light machine gun. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nCharge light machine gun fires a volley of projectiles at extreme speed which makes it ideal for area denial.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeLMG.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeSniperRifle.label: charge sniper shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.label: charge sniper rifle
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.description: A charged-shot triple barreled sniper rifle. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nDue to three separate barrels firing simultaneously, weapon power is reduced and rate of fire is decreased.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeMinigun.label: charge minigun shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeMinigun.label: charge minigun
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeMinigun.description: A charged-shot minigun. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nCapable of covering the entire area in volley of anti-armor rounds, this minigun is often used by glitterworld mercenaries during their infamous raids.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeMinigun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeMinigun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeRocketLauncher.label: charge rocket launcher
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeRocketLauncher.description: Fires a single anti grain shell at precise accuracy due to laser targeting. The warhead explodes in the air, releasing a wave of deadly electroshock.
LanguageData.VWE_Rocket_AntiGrain.label: antigrain rocket
